example.text: Over 160,000 seniors in my district rely on Social Security for retirement. My colleagues across the aisle are approaching Social Security as if it is an unearned handout, and that is beyond offensive.

We need more housing and to rebuild economic opportunities and investments that bring jobs back to the south coast. We can do all this while working to protect our environment and stand up for our Oregon values.

We can welcome a new generation of the workforce as they retire. It is our responsibility to make sure that Social Security can be successful into the future, and I am proud to have a bill that helps protect that.
Enough is enough. That is why I support the Syria War Powers Resolution that the House voted on earlier this week.
Enough is enough. That is why I support the Syria War Powers Resolution that the House voted on earlier this week.
